paulissen-wendt-2023-lauri.title: Lauri Ingman at {S}em{E}val-2023 Task 4: A Chain Classifier for Identifying Human Values behind Arguments
paulissen-wendt-2023-lauri.author:
Paulissen, Spencer  and
Wendt, Caroline
paulissen-wendt-2023-lauri.paperMotivationText: Identifying expressions of human values in textual data is a crucial albeit complicated challenge
paulissen-wendt-2023-lauri.paperContributionText: They propose their submission to ValueEval, the SemEval 2023 Task 4. They investigate the effectiveness of chain classifiers for multi-label classification of human values.
paulissen-wendt-2023-lauri.paperResultsText: They show that their best model substantially surpasses the baselines provided in the shared task.
